column5: Sorry for your loss.
My condolences Fisherman. Sounds like she had a great life and was really someone special.  I am taking my own 88 year old Mother to the hospital tomorrow morning for hip replacement surgery!
My condolences and thoughts are with you and your family, I just went throught it on March 15th, we lost my dad at only 82. FLEX
Sorry to hear about your Mom....my condolences to you and your family
Ah man sorry to hear this sadding news bud.  Our condolences to you and your family.  Brian&Betty
My condolences Fisherman. Mothers are sure special. Our thoughts and prayers are with you in mind.
Sorry to hear, my condolences to you and your family.
My condolences Fisherman to you and your family.
To all of you that sent your condolences, my family expresses many heartfelt thanks for your support..Fisherman/Erich.
Really sorry to hear. My condolences to you and your family
Sorry to hear about this. Mothers are to be cherished, held close to our hearts and never forgotten.
Deepest condolences ... it's always too soon but hopefully her light will shine on in you and the family she shared her 93 years with
Sad news Fisherman, please accept my condolances.
My condolences. i know how it feels to loose a family member  My father past away in 97 and my mother past away in 98. lost them  both to the big C Again my  condolences to you and your family
93 and still coherent. God Bless her!! My condolences to you and your family. Celebrate her life.

Well today was the day, like many before, I got that call that pretty much emotionally cripples you.  After almost 93 years on this globe, nature has taken our mother.  In the last couple weeks her physical condition was deteriorating and the fine nurses at the old folks home gave my brother and I the nod that it was coming.  Fortunately, she still had her wits about her and quite coherent.  My thanks for making it a pleasant stay at the Guildwood Nursing home go to the fine staff and, to my only and older brother who for many, many years and countless hours, took care of Mom both at home and gave her the extra quality of life in her last years at the nursing home.  Mothers aren't forever, go visit yours soon.
God Speed to your Mother Fisherman! She lived a nice long life, with a couple of lads to be proud of I'm sure!  The last line's the truth!
My condolences to you and your family Fisherman.  Will be hugging my mum a little more often.

93 years is a pretty amazing journey... I am sure you will have many memories of her tales to share with the great grandchildren some day.  And a little reminder prayer for the next few days to think about for you:  "Lord make me a channel of thy peace -- that where there is hatred, I may bring love -- that where there is wrong, I may bring the spirit of forgiveness -- that where there is discord, I may bring harmony -- that where there is error, I may bring truth -- that where there is doubt, I may bring faith -- that where there is despair, I may bring hope -- that where there are shadows, I may bring light -- that where there is sadness, I may bring joy.  Lord, grant that I may seek rather to comfort than to be comforted -- to understand, than to be understood -- to love, than to be loved.  For it is by self-forgetting that one finds. It is by forgiving that one is forgiven. It is by dying that one awakens to Eternal Life...  AMEN
93? Wow that's fantastic.  Sorry to hear about her passing,regardless of the situation it's still gotta be tough.  Condolences
Please accept Jackie and my deepest condolences.
Really sorry to hear that Fisherman.  My condolances.  Joey

I feel for ya Fisherman.  If your Mom was anything like mine, you will have a heart load of fantastic memories. I can even remember my Mom going on Camping trips with me when I was in Cubs (Scouts). I bet you can't pick a "best moment" as there were too many great moments throughout her time shared on Earth.  Cheers, Ron...
condolences.
My condolences to you and your family.  Kind regards, Sam
sorry for your loss
My condolences fisherman to you and your family.
My condolences.  Sounds like she led a great life and you will have much to be proud to keep her memories alive
So sorry to hear of your loss, sounds like she was quite a lady!
My condolences.God Bless  Hawg Hunter
My condolences to you and your family, Fisherman. Ninety-three is a good long life and a good part of that life was spent with her boys.....I'm sure she has no regrets.  Be well.
My condolences to you and your family.   93 - that's quite something - I have always been proud to say that my grandmother - Baba - lived to 94.
All of our condolences to you buddy,and knowing she's in a better place is comfort for all......Chuck and Shelley...

Allow me to share my condolences as well.   I know, some day, I'm gonna have to go through this as well.  Sounds like she lived a long and happy life as not many make it to 93.  Lots of great memories eh ?
Sorry to hear Fisherman. That is a great age to achieve. My thoughts to you and your family.
Sincere condolences Fisherman. Moms are very special people, mine has been gone almost 4 years now and I still think of her every day.  J...

Fisherman our thoughts and prayers are with you. There is a lot of love in your family. The love that your mom instilled in you will continue to grow in you and it will be shared through you to others. Your in our morning prayers.
My condolences and thoughts are with you and your family.
Sorry to hear of this news
My condolences to you and your family.
